plays.text: Penalty to Ronald Petrovicky 2 minutes for Hooking Mathieu Dandenault
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Boyd Devereaux and Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Dean McAmmond assisted by Craig Conroy and Derek Morris
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Boyd Devereaux and Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Robyn Regehr assisted by Dean McAmmond and Craig Conroy
Goal scored by Kirk Maltby assisted by Brett Hull and Fredrik Olausson
Penalty to JAMIE WRIGHT 2 minutes for Hooking Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Igor Larionov and Steve Duchesne
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Slashing Jarome Iginla
